みみより！くらし解説「夫婦別姓を選びたい 司法の判断は？」[字]
programme.desc: 夫婦は同じ名字にすべきか、別々の名字も選べるようにすべきか？「選択的夫婦別姓」を認めるか、改めて注目を集めている。先日の最高裁の判断や今後の注目点を解説する。.(n)

programme.title: NHK地域局発 北海道道「詩梨ちゃん事件から2年 母と子をどう守るのか」[字]
programme.desc: 当時2歳の池田詩梨ちゃんを死なせたとして母親が罪に問われた事件から2年。今も絶えない育児放棄や児童虐待。母親を支援することで子どもを守る取り組みの最新情報です。.(n)

programme.title: にっぽん百名山ミニ 5min「夏 暑寒別岳」[字]
programme.desc: 北海道の増毛山地そびえる暑寒別岳（1492m）、山腹の雨竜沼湿原はニッコウキスゲが咲き誇り“北の尾瀬”とも呼ばれる。山頂部には増毛山地でしか見られない花も！.(n)

programme.title: 未来スイッチ×未来へ17ACTION☆TV「さりげない寄付」[字]
programme.desc: 先進国の中でも圧倒的に寄付額が少ない日本。ネガティブなイメージがあるため、寄付文化が広がらない。そこで立ち上がった「さりげない寄付」に取り組む団体の活動を紹介。.(n)

programme.title: きょうの料理ビギナーズ 「たっぷりヘルシーおかず おからパウダー」[字]
programme.desc: おからを乾燥させて粉状にした、食物繊維たっぷりのおからパウダー。いつものおかずに活用できるヘルシーな食材です。おいしくつくれる料理をご紹介。.(n)

programme.desc: 英語で話しかけられた時、とっさに応対できますか？ 簡単な英語で「即レス」できるよう、スタジオの出演者が画面の前のあなたを徹底的にコーチします！.(n)

programme.title: 趣味の園芸 選「さあ夏！色のアラカルト〜ジニア〜」[字]
programme.desc: 夏に次々に咲く花ジニア。花色が沢山あるのでお好みのイメージで寄せ植えを作ることが出来る。間室みどりさんがポップ、クール、エレガントの3種類の寄せ植えを提案する。.(n)

programme.title: 浮世絵EDO−LIFE「雨降りは突然に… 広重“大はしあたけの夕立”」
programme.desc: 浮世絵の世界をのぞいてみれば、江戸のリアルな暮らしが見えてくる！今日は、広重の名所江戸百景の中でも、よく知られた一枚。この雨の中、人々はどこへ向かうのか？.(n)

programme.title: まいにちスクスク 夏のおしゃれなリメークこども服（2）「ショートパンツ」[字]
programme.desc: 健康、食事、遊びなど、子育ての気になる情報やちょっとしたお役立ちアイデアをお送りする「まいにちスクスク」！魔法の5分で、あなたの子育てがもっと楽しくなりますよ！.(n)

programme.title: きょうの料理 夏を乗りきる！体にやさしいなすレシピ▽なす豚肉さっぱり焼きびたし[字]
programme.desc: 夏野菜の人気者、なす！暑くなるこれからの季節を元気に乗りきるレシピを、2日間にわたってご紹介します。1日目の講師は、料理研究家で栄養士の小田真規子さんです。.(n)

programme.title: きょうの料理ビギナーズ「みずみずしさを丸ごと トマト食べきり」[字]
programme.desc: みずみすしさと真っ赤な色が魅力のトマト。生でフレッシュな味わいを楽しんだり、加熱してうまみを引き出したりと楽しみ方もいろいろ。.(n)

programme.title: 趣味どきっ！ いまこそスマホ（4）「スマホで健康管理」[解][字]
programme.desc: 初心者向けスマホ講座。アイフォンとアンドロイド両方に対応。今回はスマホで健康管理ができるアプリを紹介。歩数計、睡眠管理、お薬手帳など。.(n)

programme.title: まる得マガジン これで一生食べ飽きない！アボカドの世界6▽ランチどんぶり＆めん[字]
programme.desc: ヘルシーで美容に良いイメージのアボカド。でもどうやって食べたらよいか迷いがちな食材でもある。アボカド料理研究家が怒涛（とう）のレシピを紹介。.(n)

programme.title: 先人たちの底力 知恵泉「家臣はボクの宝です 徳川軍団 天下を取る」[解][字][再]
programme.desc: 天下を取った徳川家康は、いかに家臣をまとめ、どんな人材登用を行ったのか。徳川軍団から、若き才能の生かし方や、難題に立ち向かうためのチームづくりの知恵を学ぶ。.(n)

programme.title: 365日の献立日記「のりまき弁当」[字]
programme.desc: 毎日のごはん作りの悩みを解決する献立をほっとする映像で紹介。昭和の名優、沢村貞子さんが26年半続けた献立日記をもとに、フードスタイリスト飯島奈美さんが料理する。.(n)

programme.title: みんなのうた「あわて床屋」〜「誰も知らない」
programme.desc: 「あわて床屋」うた：ボニージャックス／「トレロ カモミロ」うた：西六郷少年少女合唱団／「誰も知らない」うた：楠トシエ.(n)

programme.title: NHK手話ニュース[手]
programme.desc: 【キャスター】小野寺善子.(n)

programme.title: ハートネットTV「世界をつなぐ“アイタイ！”の輪」[字][再]
programme.desc: コロナで分断された世界を歌でつなぐプロジェクト。日本の歌「アイタイ！」でつながりあう世界の人々を通し、コロナ禍で抱えるの思いや多様な生き方を見つめる。ダンスも！.(n)

programme.title: きょうの健康 コロナ太りにご用心！「肥満は万病の元」[解][字]
programme.desc: さまざまな病気につながる「肥満」。脳卒中や心臓病はもちろん最近では認知症やがんのリスクとなることも分かってきた。さらに新型コロナウイルス感染症、重症化の要因にも.(n)

programme.title: 視点・論点「美術館の役割 ー新型コロナ禍の時代にー」[字]
programme.desc: 「美術館の役割 ー新型コロナ禍の時代にー」高階秀爾（大原美術館 館長）.(n)

programme.title: NHK高校講座 あらためまして ベーシック国語「文学史〜夏目漱石〜」[字]
programme.desc: 国語の基礎をあらためて学ぶ、講座バラエティー。「文学史」第2回目は、脳科学者茂木健一郎さんが語る「夏目漱石」。脳科学者ならではの漱石論にカレンさんも前のめりに！.(n)

programme.title: NHK高校講座 国語表現「挨拶と人間関係」[字]
programme.desc: 言語感覚を磨いて表現する能力の向上を目指す「国語表現」。テーマは「挨拶と人間関係」。身近な「挨拶」を見直し、より気持ちのよい、豊かな人間関係の構築を考える。.(n)

programme.title: ロンリのちから「暗黙のロンリ」[字]
programme.desc: 論理的思考力を養う番組です。毎回、簡単な例文を題材に、論理的に考えるとはどういうことかを学んでいきます。今回は「暗黙のロンリ」にひそむ危険について知ります。.(n)

programme.title: NHK高校講座 生物基礎「DNAの正確な複製」[字]
programme.desc: 最先端の生物の専門家が自らの研究を基に、高校での生物基礎の学習内容と関係づけわかりやすく伝えながら、生物を学ぶ魅力を伝える。.(n)

programme.title: NHK短歌 題「トイレ」[字]
programme.desc: 選者：佐伯裕子、ゲスト：井戸田潤。題は「トイレ」。誰しも一日に何度も利用する場所。一体どんな短歌が入選したのか。「具体」を詠み込む効果を解説。司会：小沢一敬。.(n)

programme.title: 楽ラクワンポイント介護「認知症（9）小規模多機能型居宅介護」[字]
programme.desc: 認知症の家族の介護についてアドバイスする「認知症ワンポイント介護」9回目「小規模多機能型居宅介護」について。講師は認知症ケアの第一人者の和田行男さん。.(n)

programme.title: 子ども安全リアル・ストーリー「エレベーターで二人きり」[字]

programme.title: プチプチ・アニメ ロボットパルタ「ドタバタ！うちゅうたんけん」
programme.desc: 寝ぼすけであわてんぼうのパルタ。ガールフレンドのピプコや犬のコロタたちとの、ドタバタだけれども楽しい毎日。海や山、あらゆるところで大冒険が繰り広げられます。.(n)

programme.title: しぜんとあそぼ「あり」

programme.title: にほんごであそぼ「畳語でおむすびころりん（1）」[字][デ]

programme.desc: 頭の上に花が咲くかっぱ「はなかっぱ」と個性豊かな仲間たち、そして謎の花「わか蘭」を狙う黒羽屋蝶兵衛一味が、緑いっぱいの「やまびこ村」で、てんやわんやの大騒ぎ！.(n)

programme.desc: 「老い」が書かれた70年代、消費社会が極まり生産性のない「老人」が疎外されているのに全く語られることはなかった。だからこそ「老い」をとらえ直す必要があるという。.(n)

programme.title: 浮世絵EDO−LIFE「雨降りは突然に… 広重“大はしあたけの夕立”」
programme.desc: 浮世絵の世界をのぞいてみれば、江戸のリアルな暮らしが見えてくる！今日は、広重の名所江戸百景の中でも、よく知られた一枚。この雨の中、人々はどこへ向かうのか？.(n)

programme.title: 旅するためのイタリア語（12）ホームステイをする（4）“おなかがすいています”
programme.desc: イタリアへ旅ができるようになったら、グルメや買い物を思いっきり楽しみたい！そんな場面で役立つフレーズを楽しく学ぶシリーズ。料理や映画などミニコーナーも充実。.(n)

programme.title: テレビ体操[字]

programme.title: オトッペ「茶道っぺでございます」

programme.title: シャキーン！「魔法のことばを覚えよう！」[字][デ]

programme.title: コレナンデ商会「アリの巣観察キット“あり？のまま”」[字][デ]

programme.title: パッコロリン「かいだんいくつ？」[字]

programme.title: デザインあ（201）

programme.title: プチプチ・アニメ リヴ＆ベル「ポシェットカメラ」

programme.title: てれび絵本「みずたまり」
programme.desc: 雨から生まれた「みずたまり」を通して、人々の日常をえがいた心あたたまるファンタジー。.(n)

programme.title: みんなのうた「上級生」〜「まっくら森の歌」

programme.title: u＆i「どうしてじっとしていられないの？」[解][字]
programme.desc: 主人公アイは、落ち着きのないクラスメート・ユウのことが気になっている。どうして授業中座っていられないんだろう？夢の世界の不思議な道具でユウの感覚を体験すると….(n)

programme.title: コノマチ☆リサーチ「“ミナト”をたんけんしたいぞ！」[解][字]
programme.desc: 小学3年社会の番組。漫画家ハジメ（岸田メル）のもとに、宇宙人ズビが“まちのひみつ”を調べにやって来る。今回は、港を訪ね、港の土地利用の特徴を調べていく。.(n)

programme.title: よろしく！ファンファン「自然災害とともに生きる〜水害〜」[解][字]
programme.desc: 小学4年社会科の番組。3人の小学生の宇宙人が、高性能ロボット・ファンファン（声：福圓美里）とともに日本のくらしを調べる。今回は、水害とその防災対策ついて調べる。.(n)

programme.title: 未来広告ジャパン！「水産業がさかんな地域」[解][字]
programme.desc: 「日本の国土と産業」を学ぶ小学5年社会科番組。日本の未来を考える「ジャパン広告社」の取材現場やCM制作を通して、日本の産業や自然環境、社会のなりたちを探る。.(n)

programme.title: 社会にドキリ「災害復旧と復興」[解][字]
programme.desc: 社会の仕組みを研究する研究員のアッキーが（中尾明慶）、相棒のAIキリと“ミッション”に取り組みます。今日のテーマは「災害復旧と復興」。.(n)

programme.title: カテイカ「夏の暑さをイカんせん」[解][字]
programme.desc: テキトーに暮らすエンドゥの前に、家庭科の神「カテイカ様」が降臨。暮らしの知恵と技を授ける。今回は、自然を生かした涼しい住まい方を学ぶ。出演：えんどぅ、沢城みゆき.(n)

programme.title: はりきり体育ノ介「はりきり水泳ノ介〜平泳ぎに挑戦だ！」[解][字]
programme.desc: 体育ができると人生がより楽しくなることを伝える体育番組の水泳編。「平泳ぎ」のできるポイントとできないポイントをわかりやすく伝える。.(n)

programme.title: ブレイクッ！ 劇的クリップ「チョコレートプラネットの妖怪ガマ小僧」[字]

programme.title: もっと伝わる！即レス英会話 Lesson（50）
programme.desc: 英語で話しかけられた時、とっさに応対できますか？ 簡単な英語で「即レス」できるよう、スタジオの出演者が画面の前のあなたを徹底的にコーチします！.(n)

programme.title: 【名作照明ドラマ】ハルカの光 最終話[字][再]
programme.desc: 人生の岐路に立つ客たちに光をもたらしてきたハルカ。自らの人生を照らす光に出会うことはできるのか？名作照明があなたの人生を照らす異色のドラマ、最終回の来客とは？.(n)

programme.title: グレーテルの小さなかまど「ブリガデイロ」[字]
programme.desc: Eテレで放送中の「グレーテルのかまど」のミニ番組。ブラジル生まれのボサノバ歌手、小野リサ。お誕生日に欠かせない、彼女の思い出のお菓子、ブリガデイロとは。.(n)

programme.title: まいにちスクスク 夏のおしゃれなリメークこども服（3）「ズボン」[字]
programme.desc: 健康、食事、遊びなど、子育ての気になる情報やちょっとしたお役立ちアイデアをお送りする「まいにちスクスク」！魔法の5分で、あなたの子育てがもっと楽しくなりますよ！.(n)

programme.title: きょうの料理 夏を乗りきる！体にやさしいなすレシピ「鶏ひきのマーボーなす」[字]
programme.desc: 夏野菜の人気者、なす！暑くなるこれからの季節を元気に乗りきるレシピを、2日間にわたってご紹介します。2日目の講師は、中華料理店オーナーシェフの吉田勝彦さんです。.(n)

programme.title: きょうの料理ビギナーズ「おしゃれにおいしく トマトの常備菜」[字]
programme.desc: 常備菜としても活用できるトマト。サルサやドライトマトは簡単にできて、アレンジも自在。トマトの楽しみ方がグンと広がります。.(n)

programme.title: 趣味どきっ！ 体幹バランス （4）「姿勢で腰痛改善」[解][字]
programme.desc: 体幹バランスを整えて、ブレない、ケガしない体へ！トップアスリートを指導してきた木場克己トレーナーが、腰痛の悩み解消法を伝授！正しい姿勢で体幹強化を目指そう！.(n)

programme.title: まる得マガジン これで一生食べ飽きない！アボカドの世界（7）「パンと一緒に」[字]
programme.desc: ヘルシーで美容に良いイメージのアボカド。でもどうやって食べたらよいか迷いがちな食材でもある。アボカド料理研究家が怒涛（とう）のレシピを紹介。.(n)

programme.title: 100分de名著 ボーヴォワール“老い” [新]（1）「老いは不意打ちである」[解][字]

programme.desc: BBC・裁縫バトル番組「ソーイング・ビー」日本語版。イギリスの裁縫名人たちが腕前を競う！テーマは「インターナショナル」で準決勝スタート！.(n)

programme.title: みんなのうた「ねむいいぬ」〜「名もない花のように」

programme.desc: 【キャスター】工藤咲子.(n)

programme.title: ハートネットTV「続・気になる人を真ん中に ご近所デイ・コロナ第4波の試練」[字][再]
programme.desc: 川崎市の地元住民ボランティアが運営するご近所デイ「すずの家」。コロナ禍で集まることが難しくなる中、高齢の利用者をご近所の力で支えようと奮闘する日々を追う。.(n)

programme.title: きょうの健康 コロナ太りにご用心！「ウィズコロナ時代の運動・食事法」[解][字]
programme.desc: ウィズコロナ時代の肥満解消法を特集する。家にいる時間が増え、乱れてしまった食生活を改善するには？外出がしづらい中、家の中で行える運動は？リバウンドを防ぐには？.(n)

programme.title: 視点・論点「マーケットデザインの経済学が社会を変える」[字]
programme.desc: 「マーケットデザインの経済学が社会を変える」小島武仁（東京大学 教授）.(n)

programme.title: NHK高校講座 化学基礎「分子と共有結合」[字]
programme.desc: 身のまわりの物質について、とことん調べる観察や実験を通して、さまざまな物質とその利用法を学ぶ「化学基礎」。鈴木福さんと一緒にケミストリーの世界を探究しましょう！.(n)

programme.title: NHK高校講座 物理基礎「力と質量と加速度の関係〜運動方程式〜」[字]
programme.desc: 物体に力がはたらくと、力の大きさに比例した加速度が生じる。このとき物体に生じる加速度は、物体の質量に反比例する。この関係を式で表したのが運動方程式である。.(n)

programme.title: NHK高校講座 地学基礎「地層と古環境」[字]
programme.desc: 私たちの身の回りにある自然の成り立ちについて学ぶ「地学基礎」。今回は地層がいつごろできたかと、その当時の環境がどうだったかを探る方法を学びます。.(n)

programme.title: ワンポイント手話「副詞」※字幕スーパー

programme.desc: 乱太郎・きり丸・しんべヱは、忍術学園で学ぶ忍者のたまご「忍たま」。ユニークな先生や仲間たちと、明るく・たのしく・ゆかいな毎日がくり広げられる。.(n)

programme.title: おかあさんといっしょ「スタジオライブ スペシャル」[字]
programme.desc: 「おかあさんといっしょ」の「スタジオライブ」をまた見たい！という声におこたえし、人気の歌や番組以外の歌も「歌の魅力や楽しさ」をじっくりとお届けする特別番組！.(n)

programme.title: いないいないばあっ！「ワンワン・ザ・ワールド」[字][再]
programme.desc: 中国やベトナムで放送中の現地版「いないいないばあっ！」の内容を楽しく紹介します。ワンワンやうーたんは海外でも大人気！色んな国の言葉で体操「わ〜お！」をしよう。.(n)

programme.title: アニメ メジャーセカンド2（13）「さあ準決勝！」[字][デ]
programme.desc: 満田拓也原作の大ヒット野球アニメ「メジャー」の最新シリーズ！主人公・茂野大吾や幼なじみの佐倉睦子は中学2年生に。個性派メンバーがそろう野球部での奮闘を描く。.(n)

programme.title: ブレイクッ！ 劇的クリップ「“信号ちゃんパート2”悠木碧」[字]
programme.desc: まじめな学習サイト「NHK for School」で遊ぶように学んじゃおう！アイディア満載の企画をたくさんお届けするよ。一緒にカラを打ち破ってブレイクしよう！.(n)

programme.title: まいにちスクスク 飛田和緒さん 子育て家族の常備菜（3）「おやつにアレンジ」[字]
programme.desc: 健康、食事、遊びなど、子育ての気になる情報やちょっとしたお役立ちアイデアをお送りする「まいにちスクスク」！魔法の5分で、あなたの子育てがもっと楽しくなりますよ！.(n)

programme.title: ハートネットTV▽演じることは生きること〜野外芝居集団“水族館劇場”の日々〜[解][字]
programme.desc: 建設現場など非正規で働く者たちの野外芝居集団「水族館劇場」▽巨大な仮設劇場・大量の水が降り注ぐ舞台に観客騒然▽突然の病や身内の死・開幕出来るか！？▽語り三上博史.(n)

programme.title: きょうの健康 脳と命を救う！脳梗塞対策「血栓を取り除く！最新治療」[解][字]
programme.desc: 脳梗塞は症状が現れたら一刻も早く治療を始めることが重要。薬で血栓を溶かす治療や、器具を使って血栓を直接取り除く治療が効果を上げている。最新の治療方法を解説する。.(n)

programme.title: NHK手話ニュース845[手]
programme.desc: きょう一日の国内外の主な出来事や最新のニュースを手話と映像でコンパクトにお伝えします。.(n)

programme.title: きょうの料理 栗原はるみのキッチン日和「チキンソテー青じそミントソース」[字]
programme.desc: 栗原さんの初夏の新定番、チキンソテー青じそミントソテーを紹介。皮はカリッと身はジューシーに焼くコツは必見。和ハーブの青じそにミントの組み合わせで新鮮なソースに。.(n)

programme.title: きょうの料理ビギナーズ「食感を堪能 きゅうり」[字]
programme.desc: みずみずしさと食感のよさが人気のきゅうり。肉や魚と合わせるとボリュームのあるおかずにもなります。酢との相性も抜群の料理をご紹介。.(n)

programme.title: 趣味どきっ！ 体幹バランス （5）「体幹ウォーキング」[解][字]
programme.desc: 体幹バランスを整え、ブレない・ケガしない体へ！今こそ、家の中で体力をつけるチャンス！正しい姿勢で腹圧をかけ、疲れない歩き方「体幹ウォーキング」をマスターしよう！.(n)

programme.title: まる得マガジン コンロ使わず しっかりレシピ（3）「煮込まないトマト煮」[字]
programme.desc: 暑い夏。料理でコンロを使えば汗だくに。そこで電子レンジだけで手軽に作れるのに、しっかりがっつり食べられるレシピを紹介。.(n)

programme.title: 福島をずっと見ているTV（95）「私はこうして 生きてゆく」[字]
programme.desc: 原発事故から10年、福島で上演された朗読劇に密着。当時避難した人々がつむいだ言葉を朗読するのは、原発20キロ圏内の富岡町ゆかりの人たち。10年の思いを見つめる。.(n)

programme.title: Eテレオープニング＋クロージング映像はこうして作られた[字]

programme.title: NHKプラスでより便利に楽しんで！[字]

programme.desc: 飽くなき好奇心と深い思索を通じて「人間とは何か」を問い続けてきた“知の巨人”立花隆さん。その足跡をしのび、NHKスペシャル・ETV特集をセレクション放送します。.(n)

programme.title: プチプチ・アニメ キリン・ザ・ヌープ「おくびょうヌープととげとげハリー」

programme.title: みんなのうた「passion」「小さきものたち」
programme.desc: 「passion」うた：宮本浩次／「小さきものたち」うた：MAN WITH A MISSION.(n)

programme.title: ストレッチマン・ゴールド「楽しくすごそう！雨の日も」[解][字]
programme.desc: ▽楽しくすごそう！雨の日も〜かさ怪人ドシャブリンあらわる！神奈川の学校に怪人出現！子どもたちを守るためゴールドが地球にワープ【出演】結城洋平・宇仁菅真・生駒里奈.(n)

programme.title: ミクロワールド「変形自在 アメーバの不思議」

programme.desc: キリストの血を受けたといわれる聖杯を探していて行方不明になった父親。インディは父親と聖杯を探す冒険に挑む。大ヒット冒険シリーズの第3作。村井国夫による吹替版。.(n)

programme.title: インディ・ジョーンズ／クリスタル・スカルの王国 [吹替版]
programme.desc: 全世界が熱狂したヒーロー、インディ・ジョーンズ役にハリソン・フォードがまたも扮し、新たな冒険を描いた大ヒットシリーズの第4作。内田直哉による吹替版。.(n)

programme.title: 日輪の遺産
programme.desc: 佐々部清監督が、堺雅人を主演とし、浅田次郎の同名小説を映画化。連合国軍から奪った“マッカーサーの財宝”を隠す密命をめぐり、陸軍将校らと女学生たちは壮絶な事態へ。.(n)

programme.title: インディ・ジョーンズ／最後の聖戦 [吹替版]

programme.title: 日輪の遺産
programme.desc: 佐々部清監督が、堺雅人を主演とし、浅田次郎の同名小説を映画化。連合国軍から奪った“マッカーサーの財宝”を隠す密命をめぐり、陸軍将校らと女学生たちは壮絶な事態へ。.(n)

programme.title: 出口のない海
programme.desc: 佐々部清監督が横山秀夫の小説を映画化。第ニ次大戦末期、日本海軍で人間魚雷“回天”に乗り組むことを志願した若者たちの運命を、切ないタッチで描いたヒューマンドラマ。.(n)

programme.title: 推定無罪
programme.desc: ハリソン・フォードが主演し、自分の不倫相手の女性が殺された事件で容疑者にされてしまう検事補に扮した法廷サスペンス。監督はアラン・J・パクラ。.(n)

programme.title: オデッサ・ファイル
programme.desc: イギリスの作家フレデリック・フォーサイスの人気サスペンス小説をジョン・ヴォイトを主演に迎えて映画化した傑作スリラー。若きドイツ人記者と秘密殺人組織の戦いを描く。.(n)

programme.title: ハンニバル・ライジング
programme.desc: トマス・ハリスの小説に複数回登場する精神科医で猟奇殺人犯の“ハンニバル・レクター”を描く劇場版シリーズ第4弾。レクター博士の人格を形成した生い立ちが明かされる。.(n)

programme.title: ボーダーライン（2015）
programme.desc: 米国とメキシコの国境地帯を舞台に、麻薬密売をめぐるすさまじい攻防戦を、『ブレードランナー 2049』のD・ヴィルヌーヴ監督が、迫真の臨場感で鮮烈に描いた衝撃作。.(n)

programme.title: ボーダーライン：ソルジャーズ・デイ
programme.desc: 麻薬問題を背景にしたハード犯罪劇『ボーダーライン』の続編。家族を殺されたコロンビアの元検察官アレハンドロは新たにメキシコの麻薬カルテルに戦いを挑む。.(n)

programme.title: キューティ・ブロンド
programme.desc: 人気女優リース・ウィザースプーンが本領を発揮した青春コメディ。陽気な天然ブロンド娘が持ち前のポジティブさを武器に名門ロー・スクールで大旋風を巻き起こしていく。.(n)

programme.title: キューティ・ブロンド／ハッピーMAX
programme.desc: 人気女優リース・ウィザースプーンが、超ポジティブなヒロインを好演した大ヒットコメディの続編。かわいいものが大好きなヒロインは、次は政治の世界で旋風を巻き起こす。.(n)

programme.title: マッドマックス
programme.desc: 1979年に製作され、俳優メル・ギブソンを一躍スターの座に押し上げたアクション作。改造ショットガンを手に暴走族に立ち向かう特別警察官マックスの活躍を描く。.(n)

programme.title: マッドマックス
programme.desc: 1979年に製作され、俳優メル・ギブソンを一躍スターの座に押し上げたアクション作。改造ショットガンを手に暴走族に立ち向かう特別警察官マックスの活躍を描く。.(n)

programme.title: 背徳の王宮
programme.desc: 16世紀の李氏朝鮮の暴君、燕山君(ヨンサングン)。家臣などの男女の葛藤をエロスとアクションの満載で描いた韓国時代劇。『アシュラ(2016)』のチュ・ジフン主演。.(n)

programme.title: 背徳の王宮
programme.desc: 16世紀の李氏朝鮮の暴君、燕山君(ヨンサングン)。家臣などの男女の葛藤をエロスとアクションの満載で描いた韓国時代劇。『アシュラ(2016)』のチュ・ジフン主演。.(n)

programme.title: 愛のタリオ [R-15指定版]
programme.desc: 「私の頭の中の消しゴム」の人気男優チョン・ウソン主演のエロティックサスペンス。都会の大学教授と出会って恋に落ちた地方の少女が、彼に捨てられて復讐の鬼に変貌する。.(n)

programme.title: 愛のタリオ [R-15指定版]
programme.desc: 「私の頭の中の消しゴム」の人気男優チョン・ウソン主演のエロティックサスペンス。都会の大学教授と出会って恋に落ちた地方の少女が、彼に捨てられて復讐の鬼に変貌する。.(n)

programme.title: プライベート・レッスン
programme.desc: 思春期を迎えた少年が体験する、年上の女性との恋や成長を描く。ヒロインを『エマニエル夫人』のシルヴィア・クリステルが演じる。.(n)

programme.title: リンカーン
programme.desc: スティーヴン・スピルバーグ監督が、リンカーン大統領が奴隷制度撤廃に尽力する姿を描いた感動作。第85回アカデミー賞で主演男優賞と美術賞を受賞。.(n)

programme.title: キリングゲーム
programme.desc: ジョン・トラヴォルタとロバート・デ・ニーロというハリウッドの2大スターが夢の初顔合わせを実現。壮絶な一騎打ちを繰り広げる男たちを熱演した、サスペンスアクション。.(n)

programme.title: ザ・シークレット・サービス
programme.desc: クリント・イーストウッド主演に『U・ボート』のウォルフガング・ペーターゼン監督が、大統領暗殺を目論む殺し屋と老練な警護官の対決を描くアクション・サスペンス。.(n)

programme.title: コンスタンティン
programme.desc: キアヌ・リーヴス主演でアメコミを映画化した、オカルトアクション。天使や悪魔を見分ける力を持つ探偵コンスタンティンは、天界と魔界を揺るがす陰謀に巻き込まれていく。.(n)

programme.title: 山猫は眠らない
programme.desc: トム・ベレンジャー主演の痛快アクションシリーズの第1作。異国のVIP暗殺の命を受けてジャングルに放たれた2匹の“山猫”。1匹は歴戦のベテラン、もう1匹は新米兵士で…。.(n)

programme.title: U・ボート [ディレクターズ・カット]
programme.desc: 第二次世界大戦下、ドイツ軍の潜水艦U・ボートの過酷な航海を描いた戦争ドラマの秀作。監督のウォルフガング・ペーターゼンが自ら再編集したディレクターズ・カット版。.(n)

programme.title: チャーリーとチョコレート工場 [吹替版]
programme.desc: ティム・バートン監督、ジョニー・デップ主演。常識を超えた不思議なチョコレート工場が舞台。大人も子どもも楽しめるメガヒットファンタジー。藤原啓治による吹替版。.(n)

programme.title: プライベート・レッスン
programme.desc: 思春期を迎えた少年が体験する、年上の女性との恋や成長を描く。ヒロインを『エマニエル夫人』のシルヴィア・クリステルが演じる。.(n)

programme.title: ナイト ミュージアム [吹替版]
programme.desc: ベン・スティラー主演のファンタジーコメディシリーズ第1作。夜の博物館(ミュージアム)で展示物たちが生きているかのように動き出す珍騒動が発生。檀臣幸による吹替版。.(n)

programme.desc: US-born Max is at the heart of British politics and power, owner of a media empire that includes newspapers and television stations. programme.title: Shaun Micallef's Mad As Hell
programme.desc: One man. A desk. The world. Hold onto your socks! Australia's second favourite funny man returns to Aunty with a brand new show that's guaranteed to blow the lid off an entirely different kettle of fish. Shaun Micallef's MAD AS HELL is a half-hour weekly round-up, branding, inoculation and crutching of all the important news stories of the week. Along with a like-minded think tank of reporters and pundits, Shaun Micallef's MAD AS HELL offers not only reportage and analysis of the week's events, but discussion, argument and dissection of what's making the world turn every which way. Shaun Micallef's MAD AS HELL - The show that knows that if NEWS isn't NOW it's NOWHERE. So don't just sit there, get up out of your chair right now and go to the window, open it, and stick your head out and yell, "I'm going to watch Shaun Micallef's MAD AS HELL. Premiering Friday 25 May at 8pm on ABC1". It'll save us having to do any promotion.(n)

programme.title: Cheri
programme.desc: Stephen Frears (The Queen) directs Michelle Pfeiffer as high-class courtesan Lea de Lonval, living in Paris in 1906, who is reaching the end of her career. She has achieved wealth and independence but is rejected by polite society. Taking tea with Madame Peloux (Kathy Bates), a former rival courtesan, she meets Peloux's dissolute and immature 19-year-old son Fred, nicknamed Cheri (Rupert Friend). Peloux wants her to take him in hand. The attraction is instant, and develops into a six-year affair, with Lea mentoring Cheri in the ways of the world. The relationship ends abruptly when a marriage is arranged between Cheri and Edmee (Felicity Jones), the pretty young daughter of another former courtesan. Both Lea and Cheri pretend not to care, but miss each other horribly. Cheri mistreats and ignores his young bride and Lea leaves Paris to grieve in secret. When she hears that Cheri has left his wife, Lea returns, full of hope, but after one passionate night she realises their affair can never be anything more than that.(n)

programme.title: Charlie and Lola
programme.sub-title: I Spy With My Little Eyes
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of seven-year-old Charlie and his feisty little sister Lola in this fresh, exuberant, delightfully witty animation based on the award-winning picture books by Lauren Child. Charlie is seven. He is loving, patient, and very bright. His little sister Lola is four going on five. She is small, mischievous and very funny. Together they deal with the numerous dilemmas that every small child encounters - dealing with your first wobbly tooth, staying neat and tidy for your first school photograph, not particularly liking spiders or simply just wishing you were bigger. These little stumbling blocks spiral into a succession of imaginative games, role-play and flights of fancy (normally invented by Charlie) to coax his spirited little sister Lola round to seeing things in a more reasoned way. Eating yucky, sticky mashed potato instantly becomes an expedition to the top of Mount Fuji tasting spoonfuls of cloud fluff. Going to bed is much more fun if it involves drinking pink milk with tigers and shooing whales down the plughole. And tomatoes? Well, they're not really tomatoes. They're Moonsquirters from the land of Moon! Charlie and Lola series two consists of 26x12 minute episodes screening weekdays at 4.05pm from Friday, April 27 on ABC Kids.(n)

programme.title: Charlie and Lola
programme.sub-title: I Spy With My Little Eyes
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of seven-year-old Charlie and his feisty little sister Lola in this fresh, exuberant, delightfully witty animation based on the award-winning picture books by Lauren Child. Charlie is seven. He is loving, patient, and very bright. His little sister Lola is four going on five. She is small, mischievous and very funny. Together they deal with the numerous dilemmas that every small child encounters - dealing with your first wobbly tooth, staying neat and tidy for your first school photograph, not particularly liking spiders or simply just wishing you were bigger. These little stumbling blocks spiral into a succession of imaginative games, role-play and flights of fancy (normally invented by Charlie) to coax his spirited little sister Lola round to seeing things in a more reasoned way. Eating yucky, sticky mashed potato instantly becomes an expedition to the top of Mount Fuji tasting spoonfuls of cloud fluff. Going to bed is much more fun if it involves drinking pink milk with tigers and shooing whales down the plughole. And tomatoes? Well, they're not really tomatoes. They're Moonsquirters from the land of Moon! Charlie and Lola series two consists of 26x12 minute episodes screening weekdays at 4.05pm from Friday, April 27 on ABC Kids.(n)

programme.title: North America With Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon Reeve begins his most ambitious journey yet - travelling the entire length of the Americas, north to south. In this first leg of his epic journey, Simon travels from the frozen beauty of Alaska down through Canada to Vancouver and the border with the United States. Landing on a huge glacier in Alaska's Denali National Park, Simon witnesses firsthand the brutal impact of global climate change in the remote north of the planet - ice is receding here at an alarming rate. Hunting caribou with Native Americans, Simon also hears both sides of the debate about President Trump's plans to open the Arctic National Wilderness Reserve to oil drilling. Canada has a much greener reputation than its powerful neighbour, but still has many of its own problems. In Vancouver, Simon meets the people saving lives in the midst of a brutal opioid addiction crisis that has cost so many lives across the North American continent.(n)

programme.title: Living Black

programme.title: Untold Australia
programme.desc: Stuttering affects 1 in 100 Australians. Most of us don't think twice about asking someone for directions or ordering a meal, but what if the words just won't come out? This documentary follows four brave Australian stutterers, the youngest aged just 12 and the oldest 64, on a once-in-a-lifetime, make-or-break journey to find their voice. Over four confronting, intensive and emotionally charged days, they will be pushed to breaking point. Will they succeed? And how could it transform their lives.(n)

programme.title: French Food Safari
programme.desc: Filmed in Australia and France, this nine-part series is a celebration of exquisite French cuisine in all its delicious complexity. programme.title: Food Safari
programme.desc: Vietnamese food contains dishes that are both balanced in flavour and good for the body and the soul. Maeve joins her friend Peter Nguyen, engineer and food expert to learn which fish sauce is best used for cooking and which one for salads. Peter also explains how to choose the right rice paper and where to find coconut juice. As herbs feature so widely in the cuisine, Peter takes us to his aunt's huge market garden full of Vietnamese mint and purple stemmed basil. Chef Angie Hong teaches Maeve to eat and appreciate the now famous soup pho and gives a rundown of the many types of Vietnamese tropical fruit available in Australia.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Mediterranean Escapes
programme.desc: Rick departs Italy and makes his way to the Greek island of Corfu, where he attends a family feast. He visits kitchens in restaurants all over the island and learns how to make authentic Greek dishes such as a Greek peasant salad with good quality feta and olives, pastitsio (a beef and macaroni pie with cinnamon, red wine and kefalo cheese) and baked Greek omelette with wild greens and herbs (horta), leeks and feta.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's India

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Steered by his Bradshaw's Guide, Michael Portillo is on the last leg of his journey from Warwick to Rye in East Sussex. In the orchards of East Malling, Kent, Michael discovers that the Edwardians' serious attitude towards cultivation bore fruit. Rootstock developed at the NIAB Centre for Fruit Research, established in 1913, is today responsible for much of world apple production. In Folkestone, Michael hears how the town coped with an influx of more than 100,000 refugees from Belgium fleeing the German invasion in 1914.(n)

programme.title: Britain's Great Cathedrals with Tony Robinson
programme.desc: Liverpool Cathedral is the Church of England's newest cathedral, and the largest in Britain. It was designed in the Gothic style by Giles Gilbert Scott, who also designed the red telephone box. It took 74 years to build and was paid for by money donated from the people of Liverpool. National tragedies such as the sinking of the Titanic - many of whose crew came from Liverpool - and the Hillsborough football disaster are remembered within its walls. It is also where Paul McCartney composed and performed his first classical piece of music, the Liverpool Oratorio.(n)

programme.title: French Food Safari
programme.desc: Filmed in Australia and France, this nine-part series is a celebration of exquisite French cuisine in all its delicious complexity. Presented by Maeve O'Meara, the series follows renowned Sydney chef Guillaume Brahimi on a personal journey back to France, the country of his birth. Together, they visit many of France's top kitchens and track down the finest food and wine the country has to offer. (Commissioned by SBS) G CC.(n)

programme.title: Food Safari
programme.desc: Tonight's safari goes into the colourful and spicy world of Indian food. Maeve joins her friend chef Ajoy Joshi in a spice emporium to learn which essential spices are used for fertility and which have antiseptic properties. Chef Daisy Rajan shares her recipe for the comfort food she whips up after a night in her restaurant. Top chef Kumar Mahadevan shows the easy steps to a tender, flavour-some rogan josh while Ajoy Joshi cooks Hyderabadi chicken in spices and its own juices.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Mediterranean Escapes
programme.desc: From Corfu, Rick heads to the Spanish island of Mallorca, where he eats what he describes as the most succulent lamb he has ever tasted. He interprets Mallorcan-style cooking with his Chicken with sobrasada, a soft and spreadable Mallorcan sausage made with pork loin and fat, paprika, salt and cayenne pepper. Rick then travels to Barcelona's La Boqueria market of St Joseph, which he says is the best place to eat Catalan food. With Catalonia in mind, he cooks the local food of salt cod fritters with allioli (a punchy garlic sauce).(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's India
programme.desc: Rick learns the art of temple cooking and perfects the knack of eating with his hands. He samples the famous south Indian sambar before taking a road trip across the spice laden Western Ghats to the land of coconuts, Kerala.(n)

programme.title: North America With Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon Reeve begins his most ambitious journey yet - travelling the entire length of the Americas, north to south. In this first leg of his epic journey, Simon travels from the frozen beauty of Alaska down through Canada to Vancouver and the border with the United States. Landing on a huge glacier in Alaska's Denali National Park, Simon witnesses firsthand the brutal impact of global climate change in the remote north of the planet - ice is receding here at an alarming rate. Hunting caribou with Native Americans, Simon also hears both sides of the debate about President Trump's plans to open the Arctic National Wilderness Reserve to oil drilling. Canada has a much greener reputation than its powerful neighbour, but still has many of its own problems. In Vancouver, Simon meets the people saving lives in the midst of a brutal opioid addiction crisis that has cost so many lives across the North American continent.(n)

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Armed with his early 20th-century Bradshaw's Guide, Michael Portillo embarks on a journey through Britain's industrial heartland in the footsteps of King George V. Starting at what was then the gateway to Lancashire - Warrington - Michael discovers this was no ordinary royal tour. He learns how it began with huge excitement among townsfolk, whose mayor Dr George Joseph received the royal party in the parlour of Warrington's magnificent town hall.(n)

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island
programme.desc: After dating the Spanish coin they found last summer to 1652, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina return to Oak Island and the strange triangle-shaped swamp to look for more clues to this 200-year-old mystery. Brothers Rick and Marty Lagina go to Global Marine Exploration, an artifact salvage company in Florida where they confirm the Spanish pirate coin found in the Oak Island swamp last summer is a Spanish 1652 8 Maravedis that had most certainly been buried there for several hundred years. Afterward, they head to Kellyco Metal Detectors in Orlando to meet with Dave Spencer and Kellyco owner, Stu Arbauch, to find out why all the positive scans for precious metals they got last summer in the swamp suddenly vanished. Stu explains scientifically how the diver searching in the murky bog could have caused the strange phenomena. Dave Spencer then suggests they return to the island now during winter to scan the frozen swamp - which they can now walk across. Rick and Marty readily agree. Joined by a team of professional treasure hunters Rick, Marty and their partners return to a frigid, snow-covered Oak Island to have the entire frozen swamp scanned with the DeepMax X6 metal detector. They get a huge signal near the Mercy Point indicating that a large object made of precious metal is buried below the ice, water and mud. A few months later, Rick and Marty Lagina re-launch a full-scale investigation with their partners to try and solve this 200-year-old mystery once and for all. While Marty Lagina and Craig Tester have diver Tony Sampson dive near the Mercy Point in the swamp to try and confirm their latest evidence, Tony finds a mysterious tree trunk in the water. If proven to have grown on dry land, this stump could be confirmation for Marty that the swamp is, as many believe, man made.(n)

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island
programme.desc: As Rick and Marty Lagina begin excavating the infamous Money Pit, a visitor shows them evidence that the treasures from King Solomon's Temple could be buried on Oak Island. While the team waits for a permit to drain and continue exploration in the mysterious island swamp, Rick and Marty Lagina bring in a geo-tech coring rig to drill in the Money Pit with to one hundred forty feet deep where, according to historical records from 1897, a concrete treasure vault is buried. But over the last two hundred years more than forty different shafts have been dug in and around the Money Pit attempting to bypass the flood tunnel booby traps. All were backfilled, leaving the actual location of the Money Pit lost and the ground full of wood and steel debris. The drilling begins, but at a depth of 53 feet, the coring bit gets plugged with debris and cannot advance deeper. Dan Blankenship then instructs the team they need to move the rig several feet to hit the vault below. With Dan's nearly fifty years of experience digging and drilling on the island, Rick and the team follow his direction. While drilling proceeds, Rick, Marty and the team meet with Paul Troutman, whose father, James, along with Dan Blankenship worked for Robert Dunfield back in 1965. Dunfield tried to solve the mystery by bulldozing Smith's Cove and dug the Money Pit one hundred feet in diameter and one hundred thirty-five feet deep. Paul shares home movies with the team showing compelling evidence and clues that were ultimately lost in the wake of the Dunfield operation. Marty and Rick understand that Dunfield isn't necessarily to blame, but see how much harder their job is today because of it.(n)

Reuniting with his sister Juliette and his brother Jeremie, the three young adults rediscover and reinvent their familial bonds, maturing and blossoming along with the wine they are making.(n)

programme.title: Through The Fire
programme.desc: Franck is a firefighter in Paris. He saves people, and he lives at the station with his wife, who is about to have twins. He's happy, but during a call out to a fire, be puts himself in danger to save his men. He wakes up in a burns centre, and realises his face has melted in the flames. He's going to have to learn to live again.(n)

programme.title: Hacker
programme.desc: Thirteen-year-old Benjamin is a highly skilled hacker, but also a teenager who is highly distrustful of others following the loss of his mother seven years earlier. Benjamin, who has never known his father, lives in a children's home. One day, he receives a visit from two men from the Danish Defence Intelligence Service, who inform him that a woman they believe to be Benjamin's mother was spotted by an airport surveillance camera several days earlier. At first, Benjamin is shocked by the news. However, he soon makes up his mind to investigate the matter and get to the bottom of what really happened to her.(n)

programme.title: The Little Witch
programme.desc: Follow the story of a small witch who is determined to be the best witch of the forest, and, along with her raven Abraxas, rolls from the one adventure to another.(n)

programme.title: Florence Foster Jenkins
programme.desc: The true story of the legendary New York heiress and socialite who obsessively pursued her dream of becoming a great opera singer. The voice she heard in her head was beautiful, but to everyone else it was hilariously awful. Her husband and manager, St Clair Bayfield, an aristocratic English actor, was determined to protect his beloved Florence from the truth. But when Florence decided to give a public concert at Carnegie Hall in 1944, St Clair knew he faced his greatest challenge.(n)

programme.title: Polina
programme.desc: Trained from an early age by rigorous, perfectionist Professor Bojinski, Polina is a promising classic dancer. She is just about to join the prestigious Bolshoi Ballet when she discovers contemporary dance. That throws everything into question on a profound level. Polina leaves it all behind and moves to France to work with famous choreographer Liria Elsaj. Despite her determination and hard work to the point of obsession, Polina just can't seem to break through. So she moves to Anvers in search of work, and a new life.(n)

programme.title: Ragnarok
programme.desc: Norwegian archaeologist Sigurd Svendsen forms a small team and sets off to find the true meaning of the secret runes found carved in rock and accidentally awakens a giant monster.(n)

In June of 1982, Israel invaded Lebanon, a country just north of its border that was already reeling from its ongoing fractious war. This feature revisits this cataclysmic moment in Lebanese history through a different lens - a kid's point of view at a Quaker school on the outskirts of Beirut. As the geopolitical conflict inches closer and closer, 11-year-old Wissam is more intent on finding the courage to tell his classmate that he loves her. For a dreamer like Wissam, who is more likely to be drawing than playing football, it's hard to comprehend the gravity of the impending violence.(n)

programme.title: Leave No Trace
programme.desc: Leave No Trace is the latest haunting film from Debra Granik (the Academy Award-nominated Winter's Bone, Stray Dog, Down To The Bone), a moody, mysterious and mesmerizing exploration of an unexpected existence on the edge. A teenage girl (breakout newcomer Thomasin Harcourt McKenzie) and her father (Ben Foster) have lived undetected for years in Forest Park, a vast woods on the edge of Portland, Oregon. A chance encounter leads to their discovery and removal from the park and into the charge of a social service agency. They try to adapt to their new surroundings, until a sudden decision sets them on a perilous journey into the wilderness seeking complete independence and forcing them to confront their conflicting desire to be part of a community and fierce need to live apart. Based on the novel My Abandonment by Peter Rock.(n)

programme.title: Our Struggles
programme.desc: Oliver, a 39-year-old supervisor, does the best he can to fight injustice at work. But when his wife Laura abandons the family home, he is left alone to juggle between the children's needs, life's daily challenges and his job. Faced with these new responsibilities, Oliver struggles to find a balance because Laura's not coming back.(n)

programme.title: Summer Of 92
programme.desc: The 1992 Danish football team competes for the European Championship.(n)

programme.title: Nadia, Butterfly
programme.desc: While young and in her prime, Nadia decides to retire from elite swimming after the Olympic Games, to escape a rigid life of sacrifice. After a disappointing individual race, Nadia's last hope at Olympic glory is reached when her relay team wins a surprise bronze medal. Accompanied by her fellow medallist - and best friend - Marie-Pierre, Nadia drifts into nights of excess punctuated by episodes of self-doubt, as the emptiness of her life after sport creeps in. Directed by Pascal Plante and stars Katerine Savard and Ariane Mainville.(n)

programme.title: 100-yr-old Man Who Climbed Out A Window
programme.desc: Based on the international bestselling novel. After a long and eventful life, Allan Karisson ends up in a nursing home, believing it to be his last stop. The only problem is that he's still in good health and in one day he turns 100. A big celebration is in the works but Allan really isn't interested and decides to escape. He climbs out a window in his slippers and embarks on a hilarious and entirely unexpected journey, involving a suitcase stuffed with cash, some unpleasant criminals, a friendly hot dog stand operator and an elephant. It would be the adventure of a lifetime for anyone else but Allan has a larger-than-life backstory: Not only has Allan witness some of the most important events of the twentieth century but he has actually played a key role in them.(n)

programme.title: Our Struggles
programme.desc: Oliver, a 39-year-old supervisor, does the best he can to fight injustice at work. But when his wife Laura abandons the family home, he is left alone to juggle between the children's needs, life's daily challenges and his job. Faced with these new responsibilities, Oliver struggles to find a balance because Laura's not coming back.(n)

Despite her determination and hard work to the point of obsession, Polina just can't seem to break through. So she moves to Anvers in search of work, and a new life.(n)

programme.title: Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety
programme.desc: Childhood friends Sonu and Titu's friendship is tested when an innocent Titu decides to marry Sweety, who is not just behind his money but is hell-bent on breaking their friendship too.(n)

programme.title: Leave No Trace
programme.desc: Leave No Trace is the latest haunting film from Debra Granik (the Academy Award-nominated Winter's Bone, Stray Dog, Down To The Bone), a moody, mysterious and mesmerizing exploration of an unexpected existence on the edge. A teenage girl (breakout newcomer Thomasin Harcourt McKenzie) and her father (Ben Foster) have lived undetected for years in Forest Park, a vast woods on the edge of Portland, Oregon. A chance encounter leads to their discovery and removal from the park and into the charge of a social service agency. They try to adapt to their new surroundings, until a sudden decision sets them on a perilous journey into the wilderness seeking complete independence and forcing them to confront their conflicting desire to be part of a community and fierce need to live apart. Based on the novel My Abandonment by Peter Rock.(n)

programme.title: Wadjda
programme.desc: Wadjda is a 10-year-old girl living in a suburb of Riyadh, the capital of Saudi Arabia. Although she lives in a conservative world, Wadjda is fun loving, entrepreneurial and always pushing the boundaries of what she can get away with. After a fight with her friend Abdullah, a neighbourhood boy she shouldn't be playing with, Wadjda sees a beautiful green bicycle for sale. She wants the bicycle desperately so that she can beat Abdullah in a race. But Wadjda's mother won't allow it, fearing repercussions from a society that sees bicycles as dangerous to a girl's virtue. So Wadjda decides to try and raise the money herself. At first, Wadjda's mother is too preoccupied with convincing her husband not to take a second wife to realise what's going on. And soon enough Wadjda's plans are thwarted when she is caught running various schemes at school. Just as she is losing hope of raising enough money, she hears of a cash prize for a Koran recitation competition at her school. She devotes herself to the memorisation and recitation of Koranic verses, and her teachers begin to see Wadjda as a model pious girl. The competition isn't going to be easy, especially for a troublemaker like Wadjda, but she refuses to give in. She is determined to continue fighting for her dreams.(n)

programme.title: Florence Foster Jenkins
programme.desc: The true story of the legendary New York heiress and socialite who obsessively pursued her dream of becoming a great opera singer. The voice she heard in her head was beautiful, but to everyone else it was hilariously awful. Her husband and manager, St Clair Bayfield, an aristocratic English actor, was determined to protect his beloved Florence from the truth. But when Florence decided to give a public concert at Carnegie Hall in 1944, St Clair knew he faced his greatest challenge.(n)

programme.title: Operation Arctic
programme.desc: Julia and her twin siblings Sindre and Ida have moved to a small town with their mother. Desperate to reach their father, who is working in southern Norway, they secretly jump aboard a helicopter flying in his direction. Unfortunately, the helicopter changes its route, and soon they find themselves lost and alone on a deserted island. Now the three are forced to face the epic powers of nature, as both blizzards and hungry polar bears threaten their very existence.(n)

programme.title: Till the End of the World
programme.desc: Based on the novel of the same name by Wu, the film revolves around an arrogant millionaire and a self-contained female scientist who find love while they are caught in a snow storm for 75 days.(n)

programme.title: Erik And Erika
programme.desc: Erik (formerly Erika) Schinegger - the ski sensation that became a media sensation. As Erika, she was celebrated. As a newly discovered Erik, he is repudiated and accused of fraud.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Story
programme.desc: Oscar winners Fred Astaire, John Houseman and Melvyn Douglas join screen legend Douglas Fairbanks Jr. in the story of the Chowder Society, an exclusive social club with a dark secret. But when the secret begins to manifest itself in a series of ghostly events, the Chowder Society must confront their past. Based on the best-selling novel by Peter Straub, this is the last feature of Astaire, Douglas and Fairbanks Jr. Trivia: the pipe organ used is the same organ that was used by Lon Chaney in The Phantom of the Opera; interiors were constructed inside the abandoned Union Station, the former New York Central Railroad's passenger train station on Broadway in Albany, NY and is now the Bank of America.(n)

programme.title: The Chefs' Line
programme.desc: Apprentice chef Cagin from Turkish restaurant Anason goes up against four home cooks.(n)

programme.title: Ready Steady Cook Uk
programme.desc: Ainsley Harriott hosts the classic 20-minute cooking challenge. His guests today are round-the-world yachtswoman Tracy Edwards and mountaineer Annabelle Bond.(n)

programme.title: Destination Flavour Down Under Bitesize
programme.desc: Some of your favourite moments and recipes from Adam Liaw's culinary and cultural journey through Australia and New Zealand. (Commissioned by SBS) (Short) (Rpt) G.(n)

programme.title: Asia Unplated With Diana Chan
programme.desc: India is a wide-ranging country where cooking varies from region to region, so Diana decides to focus on the foods of Northern India. Inspired by heavy curries and fragrant spices, Diana cooks a traditional lamb korma. Prominent chef Adam D'Sylva, of Tonka and Coda shares his Bengali fish curry, a lighter dish that is ideal for a midweek dinner. For something sweet, Diana cooks a rice pudding with fragrant northern Indian spices called kheer.(n)

programme.title: John Torode's Asia
programme.desc: The community TV guide system has no description for this program. You can help by adding the missing information: see http://www.oztivo.net/twiki/bin/view/TVGuide/HowToHelpUs.(n)

programme.title: Hairy Biker's Route 66
programme.desc: For the last leg of their route 66 odyssey, the bikers are going west to California, the golden state. First, they make a small detour to the city of light, Las Vegas. Si and Dave have been invited by one of the youngest executive chefs in the country to learn how to make the best mashed potato in the world.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: Uche, owner of The Anchor Bar and Tattoo in Atlanta, contacts Charles after noticing a drop in food and tattoo sales. Mystery diners Meagen and Justin go undercover to see if the two problems are related.(n)

programme.title: The Food Lovers' Guide to Australia
programme.desc: Maeve O'Meara and Joanna Savill continue to explore the best food and produce around. In this episode: Tasmanian cheese with a Czech cheese pioneer; Vietnamese vegetable carving; growing Italian prickly pears; and cooking at the Mexican Embassy in Canberra.(n)

programme.title: The Cook's Pantry With Matt Sinclair
programme.desc: Matt kicks things off with a feast for the whole family with his Shepherd's pie, while Michael shares a dessert with a unique twist - hazelnut spread and strawberry pizza, and Courtney makes a lamb biryani.(n)

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Today, Pati explores the Yucatan Peninsula, tasting some of the most inventive dishes at the Crab House, like their Alaskan Wontons. And experiencing the fusion of traditional Mexican cuisine with an international twist, like Tuna Tartar Kibi and Cold Pork Belly Salad at Casa de Cristian Morales. Back at home she and her sister Alisa are grilling up some summertime specialties: Grilled Shrimp Rolls, Grilled Potato Salad and a Grilled Pineapple dessert. Que Rico.(n)

programme.title: The Chefs' Line
programme.desc: Apprentice chef Cagin from Turkish restaurant Anason goes up against four home cooks.(n)

programme.title: Lidia's Italy
programme.desc: Lidia visits Le Sfogline - a pasta shop in the city of Bologna, well known by locals for their delicate hand-rolled pasta. She later makes her own fresh tagliatelle with meat sauce with walnut pesto.(n)

programme.title: Martha Bakes
programme.desc: Join Martha as she creates three enticing desserts that happen to be naturally gluten-free - lemon-cornmeal cake, spiced pumpkin pie wth a crisp rice crust, and a decadent flourless chocolate-walnut tort.(n)

programme.title: Palisa Andersons Water Heart Food
programme.desc: Palisa meets up with two old friends - fellow second-generation Thais Ari Walpole and Mahalia Barnes. They visit the Sydney Fish Market, reminisce about their childhood in Sydney over a sumptuous Thai lunch, and cook some delicious Thai-inspired recipes.(n)

programme.title: Africa On A Plate
programme.desc: Chef Zama Memela treks up into Morocco's Atlas Mountains where she travels by mule to learn about the Berber culture and the use of fresh nuts and dates combined into a traditional couscous.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: This week Maggie and Simon demonstrate how a little bird like quail can pack a big punch. Simon's Chilli Quail is a crispy explosion of flavours and Maggie uses Quince paste as a luscious yet delicate compliment to her roast Quail. Simon then looks to the simplicity of Buddhist vegetarian dumplings, Momos, while Maggie shares her recipe for preserved lemon.(n)

programme.title: French Food Safari
programme.desc: Maeve and Guillaume spend a day in a small French village with top-selling cookbook author Stephane Reynaud, and later join passionate Parisienne baker Fabrice le Bourdat in the pre-dawn hours to see the work behind the scenes of his busy bakery. Then it is into the precision of the commercial kitchen at Guillaume's restaurant for a lesson on how the perfect puff pastry is created.(n)

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's France
programme.desc: Luke travels to Marseille, the capital of Provence, to immerse himself in this seaside citys food and art culture. He hitches a ride to the local fish market with Marseille restaurateur Georgina. Using ingredients fresh off the boat, the pair draws a crowd as they set up beside the old port and cook up Georginas fusion African-French fish soup. Luke then heads to a grungy art space to create another fusion dish; this time with Michelin star winning chef Sbastien Richard. The resulting dish, cooked in a mobile wok cart, is imbued with the flavours of the Mediterranean. Luke finds a picturesque little harbour to cook his delicious salt and pepper cuttlefish, then heads out of town to the home of his uncle. They swap family stories and cook a French-Vietnamese meal using veal and red wine. (Commissioned by SBS) G CC.(n)

programme.title: Asia Unplated With Diana Chan
programme.desc: India is a wide-ranging country where cooking varies from region to region, so Diana decides to focus on the foods of Northern India. Inspired by heavy curries and fragrant spices, Diana cooks a traditional lamb korma. Prominent chef Adam D'Sylva, of Tonka and Coda shares his Bengali fish curry, a lighter dish that is ideal for a midweek dinner. For something sweet, Diana cooks a rice pudding with fragrant northern Indian spices called kheer.(n)

programme.title: John Torode's Asia
programme.desc: The community TV guide system has no description for this program. You can help by adding the missing information: see http://www.oztivo.net/twiki/bin/view/TVGuide/HowToHelpUs.(n)

programme.title: Lidia's Italy
programme.desc: Lidia visits Le Sfogline - a pasta shop in the city of Bologna, well known by locals for their delicate hand-rolled pasta. She later makes her own fresh tagliatelle with meat sauce with walnut pesto.(n)

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw
programme.desc: Aussie home cook hero Lyndey Milan and Fabbrica chef Hugh Piper are in The Cook Up kitchen chatting cheese with host Adam Liaw. They explore the best ways to use cheese on top of anything and everything.(n)

programme.title: Hairy Biker's Route 66
programme.desc: For the last leg of their route 66 odyssey, the bikers are going west to California, the golden state. First, they make a small detour to the city of light, Las Vegas. Si and Dave have been invited by one of the youngest executive chefs in the country to learn how to make the best mashed potato in the world.(n)

programme.title: French Food Safari
programme.desc: Maeve and Guillaume spend a day in a small French village with top-selling cookbook author Stephane Reynaud, and later join passionate Parisienne baker Fabrice le Bourdat in the pre-dawn hours to see the work behind the scenes of his busy bakery. Then it is into the precision of the commercial kitchen at Guillaume's restaurant for a lesson on how the perfect puff pastry is created.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: Uche, owner of The Anchor Bar and Tattoo in Atlanta, contacts Charles after noticing a drop in food and tattoo sales. Mystery diners Meagen and Justin go undercover to see if the two problems are related.(n)

programme.title: The Food Lovers' Guide to Australia
programme.desc: Maeve O'Meara and Joanna Savill continue to explore the best food and produce around. In this episode Queensland's jam and pickle ladies, bush food and native berries, Thai and Malaysian cuisines, and Hanukkah - the eight day Jewish feast.(n)

programme.title: The Cook's Pantry With Matt Sinclair
programme.desc: Courtney makes salmon and fennel tarts, while Michael makes a dish with plenty of history - chicken tikka masala, and for dessert Matt prepares a classic creme caramel.(n)

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati is preparing an epic Thanksgiving meal like no other, because this one has a Yucatecan twist. Trade in your turkey for a citrus brined bird, and your boxed stuffing with one made of chorizo, apple and cornbread. Mashed potatoes say hello to a sweet potato and pecan puree, and Brussels sprouts get spiced up with flavors of habaneros and pork belly. With Pati's family and closest friends around the table, don't expect there to be any leftovers.(n)

programme.title: The Chefs' Line
programme.desc: Apprentice chef Cagin from Turkish restaurant Anason goes up against four home cooks.(n)

programme.title: Lidia's Italy
programme.desc: It's all about fontina - a pungent cheese from the mountains of Valle d'Aosta. Lidia heads to the source of this powerful regional product - the actual cows - who head up and down the rich and fertile mountains where they eat particular grasses that ultimately affect the taste of the milk and the cheese that comes from it. And leave it to Lidia to meet the characters behind the product, and even milk one of the cows that produce the cheese. Lidia feasts on veal chops with fontina, along with a delicious fondue valle d'Aosta-style, and a great roasted pepper and olive salad with fontina and creamy mustard dressing.(n)

programme.title: Martha Bakes
programme.desc: Martha demonstrates how to bake her favourite styles of bread with alternative flours, including honey-wheat Parker House rolls, wholewheat pita bread, and molasses-oat bread.(n)

programme.title: Palisa Andersons Water Heart Food
programme.desc: Palisa meets two well-known Sydney-based chefs to explore how cuisines from different countries can mingle and influence each other. Barbados-native Paul Carmichael uses two ingredients often used in Thai cuisine - coconut and pandan - to make a Cuban-inspired dessert, and Martin Boetz makes a Chinese-style Thai duck soup.(n)

programme.title: Africa On A Plate
programme.desc: The historic seaside town of Essaouira is the breathtaking setting for Chef Zama Memela's next adventure.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: In the words of Simon Bryant, The Cook and The Chef are "going mental" this week in a program celebrating a home-grown version of one of the world's most expensive foods: French black truffles.(n)

programme.title: French Food Safari
programme.desc: Maeve and Guillaume experience the thrill of the hunt amongst the oak trees of Perigord with France's truffle king Pierre-Jean Pebeyre and his dog Alfonse as they try to find the edible fungus referred to as the black diamond. Inspired by Paul Bocuse, Guillaume uses slivers of truffle under the skin of a plump chicken ready to roast and serves it with cauliflower puree and sautAed cauliflower with caramelised eschallots.(n)

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's France
programme.desc: Luke travels to Nice, the jewel of the French Riviera, where the fresh produce is as beautiful as the scenery. Luke and local chef Dominique Le Stanc ride their bicycles to the local farmers market to collect the ingredients for a delectable onion tart and zucchini flower dish. Going to Nice and not cooking salad nicoise would be a sin, so Luke learns how to prepare the real deal in a traditional nicoise kitchen. He then takes a stroll along the Promenade deis Angls before heading to the hills to cook with sardines in the traditional way. He meets the proprietors of Oliveira, to discover the regions best olive oil and taste the owner's famous eggplant dip. (An SBS Production) (InEnglish & French) (Food) G CC.(n)

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw
programme.desc: Adam Liaw is joined in The Cook Up kitchen by food writer and TV chef Janelle Bloom and Sydney restaurant China Doll head chef Frank Shek to give their ideas on how to take shortcrust pastry to the next level.(n)

programme.title: Food Safari
programme.desc: A cuisine full of fresh flavours and clever use of spices. From the marvellous salad called fattoush (made under the Hills Hoist and with herbs just picked from the garden) to a delicious baked minced meat dish with burghul, pine nuts and spices; a wonderful ancient grain called freekeh, and a sensational pistachio baklava.(n)

programme.title: David Rocco's Dolce South East Asia
programme.desc: The Vietnam War forced many Vietnamese families to flee Saigon for other parts of the world. Their children are often referred to as Viet-Kieu, people of Vietnamese descent who grew up outside of Vietnam. David explores the incredible food scene of this dynamic city and meets a few Viet-Kieu who have now returned to their ancestral home, looking for new opportunities that are now available in the new Saigon.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Kitchen
programme.desc: Jamie sends the trainees on placements for a month, working alongside professional chefs in some of London's top restaurants. It's a fantastic opportunity for the trainees but it also tests their staying power and two more decide the life of a chef is not for them and leave the course. As the opening of the restaurant gets ever closer nothing is going to plan.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: Danny and his son Danny Jr own the Star Cafe and Star Coaches in Atlanta. They are concerned about missing food in their kitchen and a rise in fuel expenses on their tour buses.(n)

programme.title: Martha Bakes
programme.desc: Martha demonstrates how to bake her favourite styles of bread with alternative flours, including honey-wheat Parker House rolls, wholewheat pita bread, and molasses-oat bread.(n)

programme.title: Palisa Andersons Water Heart Food
programme.desc: Palisa meets two well-known Sydney-based chefs to explore how cuisines from different countries can mingle and influence each other. Barbados-native Paul Carmichael uses two ingredients often used in Thai cuisine - coconut and pandan - to make a Cuban-inspired dessert, and Martin Boetz makes a Chinese-style Thai duck soup.(n)

programme.title: Africa On A Plate
programme.desc: The historic seaside town of Essaouira is the breathtaking setting for Chef Zama Memela's next adventure.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: In the words of Simon Bryant, The Cook and The Chef are "going mental" this week in a program celebrating a home-grown version of one of the world's most expensive foods: French black truffles.(n)

programme.title: French Food Safari
programme.desc: Maeve and Guillaume experience the thrill of the hunt amongst the oak trees of Perigord with France's truffle king Pierre-Jean Pebeyre and his dog Alfonse as they try to find the edible fungus referred to as the black diamond. Inspired by Paul Bocuse, Guillaume uses slivers of truffle under the skin of a plump chicken ready to roast and serves it with cauliflower puree and sautAed cauliflower with caramelised eschallots.(n)

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's France
programme.desc: Luke travels to Nice, the jewel of the French Riviera, where the fresh produce is as beautiful as the scenery. Luke and local chef Dominique Le Stanc ride their bicycles to the local farmers market to collect the ingredients for a delectable onion tart and zucchini flower dish. Going to Nice and not cooking salad nicoise would be a sin, so Luke learns how to prepare the real deal in a traditional nicoise kitchen. He then takes a stroll along the Promenade deis Angls before heading to the hills to cook with sardines in the traditional way. He meets the proprietors of Oliveira, to discover the regions best olive oil and taste the owner's famous eggplant dip. (An SBS Production) (InEnglish & French) (Food) G CC.(n)

programme.title: Food Safari
programme.desc: A cuisine full of fresh flavours and clever use of spices. From the marvellous salad called fattoush (made under the Hills Hoist and with herbs just picked from the garden) to a delicious baked minced meat dish with burghul, pine nuts and spices; a wonderful ancient grain called freekeh, and a sensational pistachio baklava.(n)

programme.title: David Rocco's Dolce South East Asia
programme.desc: The Vietnam War forced many Vietnamese families to flee Saigon for other parts of the world. Their children are often referred to as Viet-Kieu, people of Vietnamese descent who grew up outside of Vietnam. David explores the incredible food scene of this dynamic city and meets a few Viet-Kieu who have now returned to their ancestral home, looking for new opportunities that are now available in the new Saigon.(n)

programme.title: Lidia's Italy
programme.desc: It's all about fontina - a pungent cheese from the mountains of Valle d'Aosta. Lidia heads to the source of this powerful regional product - the actual cows - who head up and down the rich and fertile mountains where they eat particular grasses that ultimately affect the taste of the milk and the cheese that comes from it. And leave it to Lidia to meet the characters behind the product, and even milk one of the cows that produce the cheese. Lidia feasts on veal chops with fontina, along with a delicious fondue valle d'Aosta-style, and a great roasted pepper and olive salad with fontina and creamy mustard dressing.(n)

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw
programme.desc: Adam Liaw is joined in The Cook Up kitchen by food writer and TV chef Janelle Bloom and Sydney restaurant China Doll head chef Frank Shek to give their ideas on how to take shortcrust pastry to the next level.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Kitchen
programme.desc: Jamie sends the trainees on placements for a month, working alongside professional chefs in some of London's top restaurants. It's a fantastic opportunity for the trainees but it also tests their staying power and two more decide the life of a chef is not for them and leave the course. As the opening of the restaurant gets ever closer nothing is going to plan.(n)

programme.title: French Food Safari
programme.desc: Maeve and Guillaume experience the thrill of the hunt amongst the oak trees of Perigord with France's truffle king Pierre-Jean Pebeyre and his dog Alfonse as they try to find the edible fungus referred to as the black diamond. Inspired by Paul Bocuse, Guillaume uses slivers of truffle under the skin of a plump chicken ready to roast and serves it with cauliflower puree and sautAed cauliflower with caramelised eschallots.(n)

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati's eldest son, Alan, is heading off to college. Pati wants to make sure he's well prepared with some basic cooking techniques since mom won't be doing the cooking at school. First, Pati makes the best ever No-Bake Mexican Chocolate Pie she knows her son will love. Then they head out to the grocery store, so Pati can teach Alan some essential shopping know-how. Back at home, they'll whip together a super simple dinner that is sure to impress, a prefect steak along with loaded baked potatoes with a Mexican twist and some quick charred green beans with a kick.(n)

programme.title: The Food Lovers' Guide to Australia
programme.desc: Maeve O'Meara and Joanna Savill continue to explore the best food and produce around. In this episode Japanese buckwheat noodles in Sydney, oxtail soup in Perth's Swan Valley, figs in regional NSW, and traditional Lithuanian food.(n)

programme.title: The Cook's Pantry With Matt Sinclair
programme.desc: Michael kicks things off with guest MasterChef contestant Sashi Cheliah, who shares how to cook Bang Bang chicken. Matt is joined by guest Sarah Todd who cooks a family favourite - pork and apple sausage rolls.(n)

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati invites her good friend and celebrity chef, JosA AndrAs, to cook with her. They join forces in her kitchen to whip together a series of Mexican and Spanish-influenced recipes that will be a hit on any family table.(n)

programme.title: The Chefs' Line
programme.desc: Apprentice chef Cagin from Turkish restaurant Anason goes up against four home cooks.(n)

programme.title: Lidia's Italy
programme.desc: Hearty foods dominate the mountainous landscape of Valle d'Aosta, which are interestingly paired with high quality French-style wines - an example of true border cuisine. Lidia visits with her dear friends at Les Cretes winery, whose roots go back to the 1700s as they are descendants of the original owner who came to Italy from France.(n)

programme.title: Martha Bakes
programme.desc: Martha gives three traditional cakes a healthy twist - a roulade made with oat flour and fresh berry cream, a chocolate and buckwheat torte, and a zucchini and almond cake.(n)

programme.title: Palisa Andersons Water Heart Food
programme.desc: Palisa visits two well-known Byron-based chefs to explore the idea of combining traditional cooking methods with the use of the local ingredients. Ben Devlin of Pipit restaurant experiments with the Thai concept of fish sauce, making a variety of unusual garums. Jason Saxby adapts traditional Italian recipes by using local Australian ingredients. Palisa and Jason engage in a cook off, each making their version of kangaroo tartare - one Italian-style, one Thai-style.(n)

programme.title: Africa On A Plate
programme.desc: Morocco has so much to offer among it's cuisine, and in this episode Chef Zama Memela is introduced to a marinated salmon and finally, the famed pigeon pie.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: Beef is on the menu this week as Maggie dons her boots and oilskin and travels to the far north of South Australia to experience an Outback Cattle Drive.(n)

programme.title: French Food Safari
programme.desc: Maeve and Guillaume get the lowdown on how a top-class kitchen works as they join Guillaume Brahimi at his restaurant to see how hundreds of exquisite meals are created and served. They also show why butchers are awarded France's highest culinary awards for their work, and in Melbourne, chef Gerard Fabre shows how to cook a perfect steak with French fries. The pair then spend a delightful and decadent day tasting some of the best chocolates in the world.(n)

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's France
programme.desc: Luke explores Frances southwest, sampling Basque delicacies in Biarritz and oysters on the island of d'Oleron. He discovers the key ingredients in Basque cuisine such as espelette pepper and artisan jambon. Luke meets with pastry chef Didier, and under the watchful eyes of Didiers dog and goldfish, Luke learns how to make a true gateau basque cake. At St Jean De Luz, he meets Marie-Claire, a veteran of the fish market, who provides him with an insiders look at the fish auctions. She then shares her speciality seafood soup dish. At DOleron, Luke samples some of the freshest oysters in France. (An SBS Production).(n)

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw
programme.desc: Adam is joined in The Cook Up Kitchen by two food loving friends for a half hour of good fun and conversation as they cook up a tonight's special dish - chicken wings.(n)

programme.title: Nigella: Kitchen
programme.desc: Nigella cooks on a budget with South Indian Vegetable Curry, decadent Chocolate Chip Bread pudding, Beer Braised Pork Knuckles with Caraway, Garlic, Apples and Potatoes and a crowd pleasing Pantry Paella.(n)

programme.title: Poh & Co
programme.sub-title: Great Wall Of China Plates, The
programme.desc: Catch up with Poh and her larger-than-life crew of fun-loving family and friends as they navigate life in the Adelaide suburbs with lots of laughs, an abundance of food and a few secret family recipes. In this first episode, Poh and Jono convert an old claw bath into a mushroom garden. Once Poh perfects mushroom risotto, she drives to the Barossa Valley and learns tea-blending techniques from a doyen. Poh and Jono throw a party for their friends and neighbours, and Poh cooks the most delicious baked lamb before sharing her girl guide's answer to roasting marshmallows.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall
programme.desc: Rick explores one of Cornwall's hidden secrets, the secluded and stunning Fowey Estuary, joining his friend on a boat trip to learn about the history of the area and getting a unique view of the beautiful buildings along the river bank. Downstream, after a meal of crab scotch eggs at a fashionable new restaurant, Rick discovers that the historic town of Fowey was once a hotbed of piracy.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Fruits of the Sea
programme.desc: The mullet are running up the estuary and Rick has his eye on them. He takes his friend, Brian Bate, for a spot of fishing. Brian's father was a bouncer at Rick's old nightclub before it was closed down by the police in the 1970s. Rick and Brian catch some fine mullet, and Rick is given some wonderful ingredients for a fish tagine. This is his first attempt at the Moroccan recipe, and he enlists the opinion of his youngest son, Charles. If Charles approves, the dish will be added to the resaurant's menu.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: After noticing missing food and merchandise, the owners of Epic Rollertainment in Murrieta, CA, contact Charles for help.(n)

programme.desc: In this special Sport Relief edition, comedian and TV presenter Nick Hancock joins forces with former England cricket captain Allan Lamb and chefs Lesley Waters and Richard Phillips, as Ainsley Harriott hosts the classic 20-minute cooking challenge.(n)

programme.title: Destination Flavour Down Under Bitesize
programme.desc: Some of your favourite moments and recipes from Adam Liaw's culinary and cultural journey through Australia and New Zealand. (Commissioned by SBS) (Short) (Rpt) G.(n)

programme.title: The Cook's Pantry With Matt Sinclair
programme.desc: Out in the picturesque olive groves of Cobram Estate, Matt serves up a nostalgic and delicious beef stroganoff with olive oil mash. Courtney then picks up some fresh ingredients for her beetroot cured salmon, while Matt bakes a fruity cinnamon and peach slice.(n)

programme.title: The Food Lovers' Guide to Australia
programme.desc: Maeve O'Meara and Joanna Savill continue to explore the best food and produce around. In this episode, all there is to know about olive oil; the Melbourne restaurant scene; a third generation native Australian bee keeper; and a look at Sydney's Portuguese community.(n)

programme.title: The Cook's Pantry With Matt Sinclair
programme.desc: Matt makes a brekfast favourite with a twist - chia and quinoa chai-spiced porridge, while Courtney shares a simple and healthy vegetarian dish with her stuffed tomatoes.(n)

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati shows viewers how to get the most out of one day in the city of Oaxaca. In 24 hours, she takes in the top sights, meets up with a local guide, goes to the market for lunch, and gives viewers a taste of the vibrant restaurant scene in one of the top culinary destinations in all of Mexico. In her kitchen, she recreates some of the things she had at the market and gives them some new uses.(n)

programme.title: The Chefs' Line
programme.desc: Apprentice chef Cagin from Turkish restaurant Anason goes up against four home cooks.(n)

programme.title: Lidia's Italy
programme.desc: Every region in Italy has its traditional pasta products and in Umbria, strangozzi is a particular shape that reigns. These delicate handmade pastas are omnipresent in this region, and Lidia visits the Caprai winery where some of the local women show her the tradition.(n)

programme.title: Martha Bakes
programme.desc: Martha shares three healthy breakfast recipes designed to get people eating breakfast every day - Irish-style rye bread, wholewheat popovers, and a speedy date and nut loaf.(n)

programme.title: Palisa Andersons Water Heart Food
programme.desc: In Thailand, foraging for wild ingredients and living off what the land provides is a big part of the way people live. In Byron, Indigenous woman Arabella Douglas forages for native ingredients and supplies chefs such as Josh Lewis of Fleet Restaurant. After Josh cooks Palisa a dish using emu eggs, she heads to collect pipis with Arabella, and then partake in a sumptuous campfire cook up of local seafood.(n)

programme.title: Africa On A Plate
programme.desc: This episode provides detailed recipe information from Chef Zama Memela's journey through Morocco for easy duplication at home.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: The duo reveal their idea of the perfect Sunday dinner - and their choices couldn't be more contrasting. For Maggie, it's a chance to make a simple meal - such the perfect steak sandwich or the ultimate gourmet toasted cheese sandwich. For Simon, it's his one day off work - and that allows him to sleep in, indulge his love of reading, and cook a long and complex dish solely for his own pleasure.(n)

programme.title: French Food Safari
programme.desc: Maeve and Guillaume are taken on a tour of one of the top Parisienne kitchens with three-star chef Guy Savoy, who cooks up some of his signature dishes. Then it's a visit to one of Paris' most famous wood-fired bread makers, Poilane, whose oven has been creating great sourdough for decades. Finally, there is breakfast in the markets of Lyon with legendary chef Paul Bocuse, who shares his thoughts on the future of French food.(n)

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's France
programme.desc: Luke continues his journey around the oyster island of DOleron before exploring the food traditions of the Loire Valley. He cant stop talking about the infamous hot oyster with local restaurateur James. He is reminded of his childhood through his forages for clams with local fishermen Patrick and John. A break-wall is as good as anywhere to cook up a fusion clam feast. Luke discovers some of the magic of the Loire Valley when he cooks a sumptuous rabbit dish in the cellar of an old chateau with owner Sebastian. They share a glass of wine, some freshly baked bread and a sing-a-long with some local fisherman, before Luke unearths the troglodyte fine dining scene. (Commissioned by SBS) G CC.(n)

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw
programme.desc: Recipe developer Breda Fenn and Maitre d' of Momofuku Seibo, Kylie Javier Ashton come by the Cook Up kitchen to whip up their favourite sweet potato dishes with Adam Liaw.(n)

programme.title: Australia's Food Bowl
programme.desc: The rich red soil of Mildura, coupled with precious water from the mighty Murray River, provide the perfect conditions to grow vegetables, and lots of them! A healthy river results in healthy vegetables and Stefano loves to cook with the freshest local vegetables around.(n)

programme.title: Middle East Feast With Shane Delia
programme.desc: Food is the binding agent that brings families together, and for a Sunday lunch the entire table is usually filled with colourful plates of food. Shane Delia and guest chef Tom Sarafian share their family favourites for the perfect family lunch.(n)

programme.title: Jimmy Shu's Taste Of The Territory
programme.desc: The Top End of Australia has some of the best, freshest seafood in the country and Jimmy explains why. At one of Darwin's wharfs Jimmy meets self-taught chef Rachael Ciesolka, who shows Jimmy how to cook her signature lemon citrus mud crab dish.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's French Odyssey
programme.desc: Award-winning chef Rick Stein returns to France for an idyllic gastronomic journey through the waterways of France, travelling by barge on the Canal du Midi from Bordeaux to Marseilles in search of the best food and wine the area has to offer. He waves goodbye to Padstow and boards the Plymouth to Roscoff ferry for the first stage of his journey, a leisurely tour of Brittany, known for its superb seafood.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: Byron, owner of B-Man's Teriyaki and Burgers in Pasadena, CA, becomes suspicious when he notices a drop in customers. Charles sends in Mystery Diners Kiel and Eliot, who uncover a problem with the drive-thru staff.(n)

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw
programme.desc: Recipe developer Breda Fenn and Maitre d' of Momofuku Seibo, Kylie Javier Ashton come by the Cook Up kitchen to whip up their favourite sweet potato dishes with Adam Liaw.(n)

programme.title: Fraggle Rock

programme.title: Santa Messa nella solennità dei Santi Apostoli Pietro e Paolo
programme.desc: Papa Francesco celebra la messa nella solennità dei Santi Apostoli Pietro e Paolo. La ricorrenza non solo ricorda due delle figure fondative del cristianesimo, ma celebra anche la Chiesa Cattolica nelle proprie radici.(n)

programme.desc: Un programma per raccontare la vita delle persone attraverso le dediche che vogliono inviare o ricevere: amore, amicizia e buoni sentimenti sono il cuore pulsante della trasmissione.(n)

programme.title: Don Matteo
programme.desc: Una musicista viene uccisa in camerino durante un concerto. I Carabinieri sospettano subito di un pianista di fama internazionale che in passato aveva una relazione sentimentale con la donna. Cecchini deve partecipare a un quiz televisivo.(n)

programme.title: Tg1
programme.desc: Edizione del notiziario televisivo a cura della redazione giornalistica di RAI 1. Ogni giorno, le informazioni più importanti a livello nazionale ed internazionale: cronaca, politica, cultura, società e sport.(n)

programme.title: Il pranzo è servito
programme.desc: Due concorrenti si affrontano in un quiz a premi per aggiudicarsi le cinque portate della puntata e il montepremi in palio. Inoltre, un gioco dedicato esclusivamente al pubblico che chiama da casa.(n)

programme.title: Il paradiso delle signore
programme.desc: Mentre Marta giace in fondo a una scarpata e Luca è disperso, in casa Amato si fanno gli ultimi preparativi per il matrimonio di Elena e Antonio che, un attimo prima di accedere in chiesa, ricevono una grande sorpresa.(n)

programme.title: Estate in diretta
programme.desc: Programma di attualità, cronaca e spettacolo: una grande finestra su tutti gli avvenimenti dell'estate raccontati in studio e approfonditi da collegamenti in diretta e da servizi filmati.(n)

programme.title: La prima donna che
programme.desc: Cura omeopatica contro gli stereotipi femminili. Una pillola al giorno, in soli tre minuti, attraverso materiali d'archivio e voci di giovani, raccontiamo le storie di donne pioniere in tutti i campi. Ogni giorno una scoperta.(n)

programme.title: UEFA Euro 2020
programme.desc: L'Inghilterra ospita la Germania in un torneo importante per la terza volta. L'Inghilterra ha battuto la Germania 4-2 a Wembley nella finale dei Mondiali del 1966, mentre la Germania ha battuto l'Inghilterra ai rigori nelle semifinali di EURO 1996.(n)

programme.desc: Edizione del notiziario televisivo a cura della redazione giornalistica di RAI 1. Ogni giorno, le informazioni più importanti a livello nazionale ed internazionale: cronaca, politica, cultura, società e sport.(n)

programme.title: Soliti Ignoti: Il ritorno
programme.desc: Otto identità ignote e altrettante figure nascoste, ciascuna corrispondente a un premio fino a 100.000 euro. I concorrenti devono abbinare le caratteristiche di ogni personaggio alla persona giusta.(n)

programme.title: L'amore non divorzia mai
programme.desc: Annie e Ben, appena diciottenni, si sposano di nascosto. Il padre della ragazza li obbliga ad annullare il matrimonio, e il giovane parte per New York. Quindici anni dopo i due scoprono che la loro unione è ancora valida.(n)

programme.title: Notti europee
programme.desc: Tutte le sere, al termine della partite. Conduce Marco Lollobrigida, con Danielle Madam, la campionessa italiana di getto del peso, e con Alessandro Spillo Altobelli, Ana Aquiles, Domenico Marocchino, e Gianfranco Teotino come opinionisti.(n)

programme.title: Don Matteo
programme.desc: Natalina si reca in una sala scommesse e scopre che uno dei giocatori è il capitano Anceschi. All'uscita del locale, nel frattempo, un uomo si prepara ad effettuare un rapimento che tocca da vicino don Matteo.(n)
